captions.text: - I just texted my parents that I'm going

to go drag racing on
the bridge from Greece.
And then I asked them to remember me well.

- Were here today to drag
race some fast expensive cars.
As much as I love looking at fast cars
And that's kind of terrifying to me.
- It's something I've always wanted to do.

- I hope that my screaming
isn't gonna distract them.
He's my driver for the day.
So how fast will we be going?
- Over 100 miles an hour for sure.

- Do you think the Ferrari
can beat the Nissan?

- That is one of the fastest
cars on the face on the planet.
- I think it's gonna beat that.
So I don't think he's gonna win.
I'm ready for this to be over.

- I feel like this would not
be here if there wasn't danger.
Awe man, Quinta can eat shit.
All that matters is that I won.
- I loved every minute of it.
I now get why people drive fast cars.
- I'd rather buy a nice purse.

- I picked Riley to be
my driver in the Ferrari.
So we're gonna kick some butt.
- I picked Andy to drive me in the GTR.

Because I feel like he
knows what he's doing
and we're gonna get a sure fire win.
Do I look like I'm fast?
- No one's asking you to run anywhere.
I wanna do it again like seven more times.

- How do they do that
sexy get out of the car?

- There is no sexy way
to get out of these cars.
- It was like being on a roller coaster--
- You have the control over it though.
- And now we're gonna take on each other.
Is that we both had Riley as our driver.
Why don't you come in here and you tell us
- Okay, Riley has a big crush on me.
- Okay that was faster this time Riley.
- I wanna do this everyday of my life.
- We almost hit the camera guy.
We almost hit the cop right there.
So you know, Riley took some risks.
I'm the winner of drag racing.
I hated every minute of it.
And I'm getting an Icee pop as a reward.

At the end of the day it
doesn't matter who won
- I'm proud that I did it twice.
- I think this should be my job now.
- I think I've caught the bug now.

I get how people do it
once and they catch the bug

- Yeah, the next time is to
see how much him and I scream
- The next BuzzFeed video for sure.
One good looking dude and me.

comments.author: Hunter Bruno (HB)

comments.text:
+Hunter Bruno When it comes to cars like Ferrari you're paying for a lot 
more than speed, from the way the chassis is built to the carbon fiber, the 
experience of the engine behind you, the smoother transmission, sound, 
handcrafting etc. That's why the Ferrari is $233k versus a $100k Nissan.


Ferrari put their money into the experience and delivers art in the form of 
a car.


Nissan put their money into efficiency and delivers nothing more than a 
speed box.
